name: Pure UV Protector 100% Mineral Filter SPF30+ Sun Cream for All Skin Types 40ml
shortDesc: Hassas ve Tüm Ciltler için SPF 30 Saf Güneş Koruyucu

tabs.title: Explanation
tabs.html:
Suitable for use on all and sensitive skin types.
It protects the skin from UVA and UVB rays while benefiting from the positive effects of light. It provides 100% mineral sun protection. It is water resistant and has an ultra-fluid texture that does not leave white marks.
Dermatologically tested. Non-comedogenic.

tabs.title: Protection Factor
tabs.html: SPF 30

tabs.title: Use
tabs.html:
• Shake well before use.

• Before sun exposure, after swimming, cleansing your skin and sweating, reapply to protect your face, neck, décolleté area and hands from the sun.

• Do not apply to damaged skin.

• Suitable for adults and children aged 3 and over.

name: Pure Active Retinol 0.3% Anti-Wrinkle Pure Concentrate Care 15 ml
shortDesc: Olgun Ciltlerde Sarkma ve Kırışıklık Karşıtı Konsantre Bakım

tabs.title: Explanation
tabs.html: It helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and skin sagging.

tabs.title: Use
tabs.html:
• Apply by removing the droplet from the top of the bottle.

• Applied at night before your care cream.

• Avoid applying around the eyes.

• Always close the lid of the product after use.

• Do not store this product above 30 °C.

• It is not suitable for those who are pregnant or considering becoming pregnant.
